title: Chrysler World Headquarters and Technology Center - Wikipedia
snippet: The Chrysler World Headquarters and Technology Center (CTC) is the headquarters and main research and development facility for the automobile manufacturer Chrysler (now known as Stellantis North America). The 504-acre (204 ha) complex is located next to Interstate 75 in Auburn Hills, Michigan, a ...
